roleset.name: indiscriminate spreading of information in bulk
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No corresponding VNcls (butter-9.9 would fit if not for the constraints on concreteness).

example.name: arg2
example.text: there 's a way to word the description that works and does n't get you slapped for " keyword spamming " -LRB- which is what putting Marshall in the descriptive text will earn you -RRB- .

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: I woke up today to read about an anon who claimed their spamming of an askblog's inbox was “just innocent questions”
